entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Request] Dotnet Host Should Support Programmatic Installation Architecture Scans #108503
  • `dotnet --info` returns an incorrect value for x86 SDK with Non Native Host #108502
  • Unactionable trim warning on class with attribute that has RUC ctor #108501
  • .NET 8: String interpolation with IPAddress has breaking change #108491
  • Testing WASI code outside of the current repo #108490
  • Last() throws an exception when applied on a concatenation of a collection with two empty collections #108477
  • exePath_UserLevelNone failing when testing against source-build config #108476
    10.0.0
  • ARM64 GC: Use SVE when sorting the mark list #108473
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Use newer clang to build emscripten dependencies #108472
    10.0.0
  • Guarded devirtualization generates checks that are never true #108471
  • FileStream Not Suppressing Finalization on Dispose Call #108465

Closed

  • [Perf] Multiple platforms: Regressions in System.Reflection #108445
    10.0.0
  • [9.0] System.Security.Cryptography.Tests native crash in RSAOpenSsl: !newKey.IsInvalid assert failure #107929
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE: Add signed versions of the CreateWhileLessThanMask APIs #108384
    10.0.0
  • Port System.Net docs for .NET 9 APIs #106789
    9.0.0
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException: The parameter is incorrect. #108322
    10.0.0
  • PosixSignalRegistration.Create hangs debugger on MacOS (Rider & VSCode) #106194

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix differences between bash and cmd versions of crossgen test script #108500
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108499
    area-System.Globalization
  • ILLink: Avoid warning for RUC field rooted as part of a root assembly #108498
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use a more exact base class for considerGuardedDevirtualization #108497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108496
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #108495
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix ILLink behavior for modreq types #108494
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Use edge weights in `LinearScan::findPredBlockForLiveIn` #108493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Work in Progress] Fix an issue with the last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #108492
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Simplify IsComObjectType checks #108487
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix LINQ Last() in ConcatNIterator to also check base case (Concat2Iterator) #108486
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Interpreter Fixes #108485
    area-VM-coreclr
  • feat: add StringSyntax for KeyReference URI parameters #108484
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix `InlineArray` swift lowering in mono #108483
    Servicing-approved, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • Improve software exception handling performance #108480
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Added DateOnly overload methods to IsoWeek #108479
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix rooting JSWebWorkerInstance #108475
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use default timeout for launching the browser in WBT #108474
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0] Fix devirtualization across genericness in the hierarchy #108470
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [MonoVM] Fix assert on startup with abcrem optimization enabled #108469
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update field references in properties - testing only #108468
    NO-MERGE
  • [release/9.0] Update System.Formats.Nrbf ref sources and restore package description #108467
    Servicing-consider, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Fix wrong Region Info Names #108466
    area-System.Globalization

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #108462
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #108463
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Don't bail out on side-effects in assertionprop #108418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add instructions to debug CLI builds using VS #108455
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [infra][android Disable Android ARM64 runtime tests job #108439
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException when buffers total size greater than 2GB #108380
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Update System.Formats.Nrbf ref sources and restore package description #108430
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf

Updated

  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [cdac][cdac-build-tool] Don't let msbuild rewrite the resource name #108296
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • use collection syntax in illink #108458
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] Add DefaultMemberAttribute to Test.CoreLib #108258
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2551310 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update field references in property accessors #108413
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • MSFT:53847109 [.NET Core] DTS / UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups returns PrincipalOperationException: Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212). #108032
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Split the HostApplicationBuilder configuration. #107616
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • JIT: move funclet separation later #108456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    blocking, blocking-clean-ci, area-Infrastructure
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Use VNVisitReachingVNs in more places #108420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108415
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108419
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix IPGlobalProperties.DomainName to return string.Empty when domain name is not set #107241
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Debug missing MicrosoftNetCoreAppRuntimePackDir #107280
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Networking stress tests infrastructure improvements. #108325
    area-System.Net
  • [release/9.0] [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #108294
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [aot] mono_aot_split_options: reset state after a backslash #108212
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Allow devirt into abstract classes if we saw a non-abstract child #108379
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Trying to support changing member accessibility #108350
    area-EnC-mono
  • Enable build with Checked option for libraries configuration #108433
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix SIMD class retrieval and type checks #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Share pthread_setname via minipal #108370
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108451
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43853
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43848
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43847
  • When trying to install dotnet-ef tool, we get error saying that dotnet-ef is not a .NET tool #43844
  • Multiple string null and empty check #43828

Closed

  • Suggestion: Add custom MSBuild targets to the command resolver, i.e. `dotnet mytarget` #8185
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Show dogfood annotation in prompt #43846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dev container to centos-stream9 #43845

Merged

  • Create a dotnet-new template for .gitattributes #43764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Lock comments for Windows setup #43699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.404 #43824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.307 #43823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.111 #43822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Update branding to 6.0.136 #43820
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.428 #43821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change to attempt launching browser on dotnet run - Related Issue #9038 #43615
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #43819
    Servicing-approved
  • Disable baseline manifest generation #43797
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update manpages for 9.0 #43776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add missing conditions for illumos #43775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No suggestions in switch expression arm when dotting on an enum type in a `Color Color` case #75350
    Backlog
  • No code actions available for member in documentation comment when member is not known #75349
    Backlog
  • Suggest name when naming tuple item #75347
    Backlog
  • Assert fails with collection expression of bools #75343
    17.13
  • Feature Request: Namespaced autocomplete #75342
  • InvalidOperationException in DocumentHighlighting.AbstractDocumentHighlightsService.AddLocationSpanAsync #75337

Closed

  • Pattern match condition in ternary resulting in collection expression fails to parse; ternary appears to be mis-parsed as nullability modifier #75318
    17.13
  • ITypeSymbol.NullableAnnotation is NotAnnotated for System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault's return type #75119
  • `await foreach` utilizing struct enumerator never ends #72820
    17.13
  • [Bug]: Choosing IntelliSense member for `abstract override` does not generate corresponding code snippet #72338
  • [LSP] [Bug]: Retroactively adding keywords in front of any token can sometimes delete it #68539
    18.0
  • Natural delegate type depends on order of candidates #71333
    17.12
  • XML Literal Hot Reload Issue #75231
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35401.79 #75333
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35401.85 #75332

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations and UI thread CPU costs in WithDoNotCreateCreationPolicy #75358
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable OverflowOnFluentCall_ExtensionMethods test #75357
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update status for `field` keyword feature #75356
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Avoid linking back to the original TreeSource in document state updates if the associated lazy is already completed #75355
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make the types in CSharp Features sealed #75352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations during typing #75351
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't update xaml tool #75348
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75346
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Added "propr" snippet for required properties #75339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use primary constructor in rename command handler #75336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix ambiguity parsing collection in conditional expressions #75328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75345
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Make types in Workspace layer sealed #75321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode, Next
  • Fixes comparison of VB XML literals #75301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix null coalescing operator emit with span conversion #75103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2550589 #75334
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75360
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75359
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix crash with Dispose method with params #75305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only provide fallback options for host analyzers #75317
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report error for native PDB limit #75293
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow accessing ref fields through rvalues #75316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi fails to generate document when using polymorphic types #58213
  • Perf regression: json_spring, json_spring, single_query #58211
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #58210
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring, fortunes_spring, mvc #58209
  • blazor.server.js SyntaxError: Unexpected token '{' in Safari Version 16.3. with a Mac Studio using Ventura 13.2 #58212
  • BindProperty attribute should support primary constructors with classes #58205
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #58203
  • Blazor Virtualize: root-level scrolling breaks on horizontal scroll enabled in the container #58200

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes, updates #58162
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #58201
  • Perf regression: plaintext #58202
  • SwaggerUI broken by primitive return values + endpoint filters #52128
  • Google Auth HttpContext.ChallengeAsync() ends with AuthenticationFailureException in .Net 8 but not .Net 7 #53562
    9.0-rc2
  • High memory usage on an idle web app #53933
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi incomplete/inconsistent enum handling #58195
  • OpenApi: The IEndpointParameterMetadataProvider is not used for Controllers #58178

PullRequests

Created

  • Add source generator to emit public Program class definition #58199
    area-infrastructure, area-minimal

Merged

  • [Backport] Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57812
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 6.0.36
  • [Backport] Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57819
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58179
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] Enable TSA/Policheck #58124
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] Stop using Mac 11 in Helix #58063
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57966
    Servicing-approved, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0.11
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `6dae7eb` #58180
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Enable TSA/Policheck #58125
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.36
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `6dae7eb` #58185
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.36
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58186
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.36
  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #58198
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.11
  • Update November milestones #58208
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #58197
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.36

Updated

  • Run static code analysis on IIS #58167
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rtm.24479.2 #58153
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #58173
    area-mvc
  • Implement the Mvc PushFileStreamResult API #58161
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add examples for attributes #58196
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix the catalyst FlyoutItem templates to match iOS #25057
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Flyout rendering #25053
  • iOS can't select PDF - FilePicker #25051
  • Navigating to a page with an editor bound to string with large text (64k chars) is slow on Windows. #25049

Closed

  • CarouselView IsSwipeEnabled="False" still scrolls with tab navigation #12272
    Backlog
  • Improve Dogfooding Acquisition & Configuration #10621
    Backlog
  • Make a better exception message when UseCompatibility needs to be called #5308
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView: Support controlling F12 browser dev tools #22305
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Change default HybridWebView local address from 0.0.0.0 to something safer #24364
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [WinUI] Command on TableView only invokes once. #25037
  • [Bug] Project will build and deploy, but won't start debugging #25054
  • Accessing Deployment Files #23833
  • TappedGestureRecognizer ignores Frame's IsEnabled #21619
    Backlog
  • Migrating LegacySecureStorage on Android doesn't work #21688
    Backlog
  • The style on the switch is not working #22373
    Backlog
  • DisplayAlert throws NullReferenceException when called from `OnAppearing` #22260
    Backlog
  • NullPointer from SearchHandlerAppearanceTracker on iOS #19504
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ImageSource.FromFile fails in iOS when image in subfolder #22887
  • DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfoChanged not fired if app is in background (Android) #20305
  • Not able to change title bar color in MAUI UWP #19252
    Backlog
  • Windows 11 Email cannot identify the default mail app. #19643
  • WevView not allowing target="_blank" href redirects on Android #10818
    Backlog
  • Cannot deploy windows when referencing net6 and ApplicationDisplayVersion < 1.0 #10953
    Backlog
  • Selectbox is not visible when MAUI window is running on Windows 11. #10756
    Backlog
  • DataTrigger doesn't work with Style property #10124
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Match Catalyst Template to iOS for Shell Flyout Items #25056
  • [net9.0] Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25055

Merged

  • Revert "Update windows samples" #25059
  • [net9.0] Merge release rc2 to net9.0 #25028
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #24817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Fix collectionview tests rc2 #25045
  • Remove Drag and Drop Tests from Catalyst #25039
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [iOS] Fix NRE in Shell SearchHandlerAppearanceTracker #24970
    community ✨
  • Add services.AddHybridWebViewDeveloperTools() extension to enable browser dev tools #25047
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers (attempt 2) #25041
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [android] update `.aotprofile` for .NET 9 RC 2 #25035
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Change HybridWebView default address to 0.0.0.1 #25044
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] [android] update `.aotprofile` for .NET 9 RC 2 #25043
  • Change HybridWebView default address to 0.0.0.1 #25042
    area-controls-hybridwebview

Updated

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Move to rtm #25017
  • Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25025
  • First tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    community ✨
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex
  • Re-enable tests #24912
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Primitive collections backed by a private field doesn't get discovered by convention #34815
  • Revert BinSkim workaround #34814
    Backlog
  • migrations script generates empty script #34811
  • Investigate rising use of memory which may indicate a leak #34809

Closed

  • Error: Value cannot be null parameter name key #33831
    10.0.0
  • Mismatch in Count and ToListAsync Results When Using Global Query Filters on Joined Entities #34810
  • c# script Library\PackageCache\com.unity.ugui\Runtime\UGUI\UI\Core\Layout\LayoutRebuilder.cs(21,44): error CS0311: The type 'UnityEngine.UI.LayoutRebuilder' cannot be used as type parameter 'T' in the generic type or method 'ObjectPool<T>'. There is no implicit reference conversion from 'UnityEngine.UI.LayoutRebuilder' to 'ObjectPoolEvents'. #34812
  • Can persist IEnumerable<string>, but not retrieve #34685
  • The SaveChanges can't track items created by Enumerable.Repeat #34747
  • List<string> property causes inclusion of additional columns that are not used in the projection. #34805

PullRequests

Created

  • Throw when a nested entity type is mapped to a different JSON column. #34816
  • Reverting the BinSkim target directory #34813
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34808

Merged

  • Fix: Value cannot be null parameter name key #34730
  • [release/8.0] Remove referencing indexes when reconfiguring a property as a navigation #34651
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.11
  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #34807
  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #34806

Updated

  • Keep parameter values out IMemoryCache in RelationalCommandCache #34803
  • [release/9.0] Use 8.x Microsoft.Extensions.* packages #34769
    providers-beware, Servicing-approved
